welcome.title: Boardy
welcome.discription: An application that will help teams solve work tasks efficiently. It will help organize the work so that everyone knows what to do. Track the progress of tasks, be aware of what is happening. Correctly plan the timing and scope of work.
welcome.courseInfo: This tutorial project was developed as part of the free online course "Developing with Angular" from The Rolling Scopes community. The course is intended for RS School students of the 2021Q3 set who have passed RS School stage #2, as well as for new students who have knowledge and practical experience in using the following technologies and tools: JavaScript, TypeScript, Git, GitHub, NPM, Webpack, CSS3 / HTML5 , Chrome DevTools, Figma, REST API concept understanding.
welcome.search: Search by tasks boards or performers
welcome.alepashkou: Modified and installed the backend. Develop a board and a page with boards.
welcome.julialepner: Implemented login, sign up, user profile pages, task search.
welcome.siarheiAsmalouski: Implemented weclome page, dark mode, translation into two languages.
